text: Soul Syndrome is the 50th studio album by American musician James Brown. The album was released in 1980, by TK Records. ==Track listings== ;Original release ;;Side A ;Side B ;1991 UK T.K. Records reissue CD / 2xLP bonus tracks ;1991 US Rhino Records reissue CD bonus tracks ==References== Category:1980 albums Category:James Brown albums Category:Albums produced by James Brown
title: Soul Syndrome
